alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 2:14PM MST until December 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Happy Jack and Williams. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact Friday travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...| Snow forecast from midnight Tonight to 5 PM Friday: Doney Park 2 inches Flagstaff 3 to 6 inches Forest Lakes 1 inches Heber-Overgaard T inches Williams 3 to 5 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
